title: Kids
lyrics:
[intro, kazoo] (F#m) (D) (A) (E)
 
(F#m) You were a (D)child
Crawling on your (A)knees toward him (E)
(F#m) Making momma so (D)proud
(A) But your voice is too (E)loud
(F#m) (D) We like to watch
(A)You laughing (E)
(F#m) Picking insects off of (D)plants
(A) No time to think of conse(E)quences
 
(F#m) Control yourself (D)
Take only what you (A)need from it (E)
(F#m) A family of (D)trees wanting… (A) to be haunted (E)
 
(F#m) Control yourself (D)
Take only what you (A)need from it (E)
(F#m) A family of (D)trees wanting… (A) to be haunted
 
(F#m) The water is (D)warm
But it's sending (A)me shivers (E)
(F#m) A baby is (D)born
(A) Crying out for atten(E)tion
(F#m) Memories (D)fade
Like looking through a (A)fogged mirror (E)
(F#m)Decisions too decisions are (D)made
And not bought but I (A)thought… this wouldn't hurt a (E)lot, I guess not
 
(F#m) Control yourself (D)
Take only what you (A)need from it (E)
(F#m) A family of (D)trees wanting… (A) to be haunted (E)
 
(F#m) Control yourself (D)
Take only what you (A)need from it (E)
(F#m) A family of (D)trees wanting… (A) to be haunted (E) [end]
